title: Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When I press Ok after making changes to the project properties, I receive the following error message: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. This error occurs because setting the output location and classpath are two separate operations. Consequently, when I set the output location first, it creates an illegal state.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a project with 'src' as the source folder and 'bin' as the output location.
2. Open the project properties.
3. Change the setting to use the project as the source folder and the project as the output location.
